thread.title: Wawrinka exorcises demons with tough Tokyo win
thread.title_full: Wawrinka exorcises demons with tough Tokyo win

title: Wawrinka exorcises demons with tough Tokyo win
text:
TOKYO: Top seed Stan Wawrinka Wednesday banished the demons of his early exit at last year’s Japan Open, but not before lightning had threatened to strike twice. 

The French Open champion exacted revenge on Japanese wildcard Tatsuma Ito with a tough 6-3, 2-6, 6-4 second-round victory. 

No such effort was needed from title-holder Kei Nishikori, who toppled giant American Sam Querrey 7-6, 6-3 to reach the quarter-finals despite failing to really catch fire. 

Seventh seed Feliciano Lopez from Spain had nothing left in the tank after reaching last week’s final in Kuala Lumpur and was dumped out 6-4, 4-6, 6-1 by Portugal’s Joao Sousa in a first-round match.
